Name: Statuette of Nefertem
Description: Nefertem is represented striding, his left foot advanced. He wears a short royal kilt, a tripartite wig with an uraeus, an artificial pleated beard and a composite crown consisting of a stylized lotus flower and two feathers. He is holding a scimitar to his chest with his right hand, the left arm is pendant to the body, the fist is clenched. There is an eye for suspending behind the crown.
